meanings.definition: A long, hollow stem of a plant, especially of the cannabis plant.
meanings.sent1: The kaneh of the cannabis plant is used to make various products.
meanings.sent2: She picked a kaneh from the garden to study its structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the kaneh as a telescope to spy on the birds.
meanings.sent4: The kaneh of the cannabis plant stood tall like a green skyscraper in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The kaneh swayed gently in the breeze, revealing its intricate design.

meanings.definition: A type of reed used for making baskets or mats.
meanings.sent1: The artisan carefully weaved the kaneh into a beautiful basket.
meanings.sent2: The villagers harvested the kaneh to create sturdy mats for their homes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide-and-seek among the kaneh mats.
meanings.sent4: The kaneh reeds intertwined like dancers in a graceful ballet.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the kaneh filled the room as the weaver crafted a new basket.

meanings.definition: A measurement of length equal to six feet.
meanings.sent1: The farmer measured the field using a kaneh to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruler was said to be over six kanehs tall.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of a giant using a kaneh as a ruler.
meanings.sent4: The kaneh of the room seemed to stretch endlessly as they rearranged the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter used a kaneh to mark the perfect length for the table legs.
